title: White Screen
body: Ever since the 7.1 update, I've been getting a full white screen after the champion select. The only way for me to fix is by restarting my computer, which takes about 5 minutes. I'm wondering if anyone else is having this issue, and if there's a way to fix it. I play on a Mac.

replies.body: This issue is so damn annoying, happens randomly from time to time and I just lost my promos due to this bug. I've sent bug reports to riot and they've literally done nothing about it. I mean you submitted this 10 months ago. The rioter who replied was completely unhelpful and just ignored us afterwards. Also like the others I play on the mac client as well.
also so many times still happened to me and i lost so many point

Your network might be failing to transfer to the game server after champion select, so no assets are being downloaded onto your screen.  You should go through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=4cnf3QLO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-01-13T23:24:13.289+0000)
>
> Your network might be failing to transfer to the game server after champion select, so no assets are being downloaded onto your screen.

Can you actually address the problem please. We clearly stated that our network is working perfectly fine on everything else that requires it. It seems that most of us experiencing this problem are playing on a mac so I'm positive that it is an issue with the mac client. Can you please get someone who works on it to have a look into it.
It's not a network issue, tested on multiple places. Perfect ping too. Also, it used to be black before the patch, assets or no assets it doesn't seem like it's on purpose.
Also happens to me (I also play on the iMac)
also happening to me.. i cant play league anymore. where you bale to fix it?
It seems to be working now! Thanks you guys! If it ever happens again I'll take another look at the guide. You guys are awesome!

I've a Mid 2012 Macbook Pro with El Capitan (10.11.6) installed and I've also have had this problem ever since the last patch. White screen just before the loading screen and overall I feel it sluggish.

Another, more annoying, bug is that I've to disable the bottom hot corner because the game lets that through for OSX.

What shut down button

I keep getting afk penalties because white screen the has to reconnect and still won't work until match is over. {{summoner:14}}
Happening to me too, have you found a fix?

Thanks for the info! I'm still looking for the problem, but a way I've found to get rid of it is to press the shut down button on the back, not long enough for it to shut down, but almost as if you are putting it on sleep mode. Doing it a couple times did the trick for me.
